title: Rice pudding with apricots
ingredients: ['850 ml (1 pint + 8 1/2 fl oz) full-fat milk', '45 g (1 1/2 oz) caster sugar', 'finely grated zest of 1 orange', '100 g (3 1/2 oz) short-grain ‘pudding’ rice', '55 g (2 oz) sultanas', 'ground cinnamon to sprinkle', 'Apricot compote', '300 g (10 1/2 oz) fresh ripe apricots, halved and stoned', 'juice of 1 orange', '1 cinnamon stick']
